content: The study of labour and industrial law envelops various aspects of industrial relations and labour welfare enactments made in the pre and post-independence era. The present Government is committed to the reform of labour legislation in the country as a part of doing ease of doing business and simplifying all social security legislations. The consolidation of all 29 laws into 4 Labour Codes made a new era of social security and Industrial Laws of the country. The Government wants these Codes to be implemented in all states of India uniformly. The present course is a detailed study of the new labor codes of India.
